```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(mosaic)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
data2 <- read_excel("~/Desktop/2018 亚马逊销售情况/2月/2018Feb1-2018Feb28CTR.xlsx")
```

```{r}
Febclean <- data2 %>%
  filter(!is.na(quantity))

Feb <- Febclean %>%
  group_by(description) %>%
  summarise(n()) %>%
  filter (str_detect(description, "Backpack"))
```
